Text:
Has anyone of you got problems playing this game? I got a chipped ps2, when I load this game it goes through the normal initial setup of chosing the game you wanna play etc, but then when you're ready to play, it shows a little monster coming from the underground and stops there. If I press various keys other monsters come up but basically it stops (or goes round in circles) there.
Any help please ?
has anybody been able to play this game
would i just burn to a dvd then pop it in a ps2 like a normal game?
i don't have eany prob. with this game, works 100% fine. i got here to help you guys out to seed this one lil bit >)

you need mod chip on your ps2 to play this game, 
and yes, it's works 100%

what chip do you need on your ps2????
and how much does it cost?????

somehow i cant get this to work on my pcsx2.
keeps saying that i need to insert a playstation or playstation 2 format disc.
can any1 help me?
But how do you know what chip u need to what game?

@JVDx
You need to set the CDVD read to "Smooth Read", with that enabled your PCSX2 will be able to load discs a normal PS2 can't.
